item.title: Video/Audio AI Project - Selfie Videos - Upwork
item.description:
Self-Videos for AI mapping – Earn up to USD40

These are the languages we need now:

Korean
Norwegian
Dutch
Danish
French(france)
French (Canada)
German
(Native only!)

Please check the PDF file for more details.

**** Do not apply if your accent is not native to these regions, as your videos may be rejected, and you could lose all your work. The positions for ENGLISH language are FILLED! ****

Job Description:
We wanted to share a project that our company is working on with Adobe, which involves crowdsourcing people for a video/audio AI project. It's a fun project where all you must do is record yourself answering some questions and upload the videos to a Google Drive. This project involves you recording up to 10 videos of yourself on your phone and answering a few simple questions. It will take 20 - 30 minutes to complete.

Please note that it may take 80 to 90 days to receive payment for
this job, after evaluation and approval of the videos.

As long as you use a modern phone with 4K video, follow the directions, record in 4K and 60 FPS, your video(s) should be approved and you will be paid for each video. As well, if your video is approved, you won’t have to submit more recordings. Your uploaded videos will be accepted as the final files, so submit up to 10.

The purpose of this project is to provide training data for AI Voice models from real people in everyday settings. Your video and audio will not be used to create a clone or replication and will not be seen or heard by anyone outside of Voxpe or the client.
Watch this video for a quick walkthrough of how to record yourself with the correct specifications.

If any of your friends and family members would like to participate in this project just let me know!


Please check the PDF file for more details.

Budget: $35
Posted On: June 15, 2024 18:55 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:M4V, MOV, Autobiography, Testimonial Video, Video Production, Voice Acting
Skills: M4V, MOV, Autobiography, Testimonial Video, Video Production, Voice Acting
Country: Canada
click to apply

item.title: YouTube Subscribe Monetize Channel - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a Tech Vlog YouTube Channel Growth Specialist to help us increase our subscribers and views. Need Subscribe watch hour monetize expert ,As a specialist, you will be responsible for implementing strategies to grow our channel's audience and engagement. This includes optimizing video titles, descriptions, tags, and thumbnails, as well as improving video search rankings and recommending collaborations with other YouTubers. The ideal candidate should have experience in growing YouTube channels, a deep understanding of YouTube analytics, and knowledge of current trends in the tech vlogging industry.

  Skills required:
  - YouTube channel growth strategies
  - Video optimization
  - YouTube analytics
  - SEO for YouTube
  - Trend analysis
  - Collaboration outreach

  This is a medium-sized project with an expected duration of 1 to 3 months.

  Expertise level: Intermediate

item.title: Teach Me to Edit a Trailer Video - Upwork
item.description:
**Overview:**
We are seeking an experienced video editor to provide guidance and tutoring on editing a video trailer for the latest update of our Unreal Engine asset, the Low Poly Shooter Pack. The trailer will be approximately 2 minutes long, though we are open to suggestions regarding its optimal length. The goal is to create a visually appealing and engaging trailer that effectively promotes our product and drives traffic to our Gumroad page.

**Responsibilities:**
- Provide one-on-one tutoring via call to assist with video editing.
- Review and improve upon previous trailers created by our team.
- Offer suggestions for additional footage if necessary.
- Teach the following skills:
  - Designing professional and attractive text overlays.
  - Selecting and syncing music with video transitions.
  - Structuring the trailer content to maximize excitement and engagement.
  - Creating visually appealing elements to highlight "available on Gumroad."
  - Engaging the audience throughout the trailer.

**Requirements:**
- Proficiency in video editing software such as Canva and DaVinci Resolve.
- Strong understanding of video editing principles, including text overlay design, music selection, and content structuring.
- Excellent communication skills for effective tutoring and guidance.
- Experience with creating promotional video content, preferably for game assets or similar products.

**Project Details:**
- The trailer is for the Low Poly Shooter Pack, an Unreal Engine asset available on the Unreal Engine Marketplace.
- Previous trailers for reference:
  - [Trailer 1](https://youtu.be/HZWLHdWuPeQ?si=E0cmo_qAzHdENTVf)
  - [Trailer 2](https://youtu.be/p25V81Ues8I?si=zCu4bgogV8BBPNKi)
- All necessary footage has been filmed, but additional footage can be captured if needed.

**Key Objectives:**
- Create a trailer that is visually appealing and engaging.
- Ensure the trailer effectively promotes the Gumroad link and free demo download.
- Provide clear and actionable guidance on video editing techniques.

**Application Process:**
Please provide examples of previous work, particularly any promotional videos or trailers you have created. Once we have discussed the project further, I will share a Google Drive link containing the footage for the trailer.

We look forward to working with a talented video editor who can help us create an outstanding trailer for our Unreal Engine asset.

Hourly Range: $10.00-$15.00
Posted On: June 15, 2024 18:38 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Trailer
Skills: Video Editing, Trailer
Country: Spain
click to apply

item.title: Fitness UGC creator for men's fitness / swimwear brand - Upwork
item.description:
About Us:
We are a men's fitness / swimwear brand, dedicated to combining functionality, style, and performance. Our mission is to provide athletes with premium, purpose-driven shorts that elevate their performance and aesthetics. We design our shorts around the muscular structure of the body, crafted to accentuate your quads. We are seeking a creative and enthusiastic UGC Creator to join our team and help us elevate our presence on TikTok and Instagram.

Job Description:
As a UGC Creator, you will be responsible for creating engaging and authentic content that resonates with our target audience on TikTok and Instagram. You will work closely with the founder to develop content strategies, create videos, and post content that showcases our products in innovative and compelling ways.

Responsibilities:
-Create high-quality, engaging video content for TikTok and Instagram that aligns with our brand voice and aesthetic.
-Develop and execute creative concepts, trends, and challenges that highlight our swimwear products.
-Collaborate with the founder to brainstorm and produce content ideas.
-Stay up-to-date with the latest trends and best practices on TikTok and Instagram.
-Interact with our community, responding to comments and messages in a timely and professional manner.
-Analyze content performance and provide insights for continuous improvement.

Requirements:
-Proven experience as a content creator, preferably in the fashion, fitness, or swimwear industries.
-Must be in very good physical shape (athletic, bodybuilding, lean etc.)
-Strong knowledge of TikTok and Instagram, including features, trends, and analytics.
-Excellent video editing skills and familiarity with editing tools/apps.
-Creative mindset with a keen eye for detail and aesthetics.
-Already a large fitness following on social media is a plus
-Passion for fitness, bodybuilding promoting a healthy lifestyle.
-Preferably living in a sunny location

Preferred Qualifications:
-Experience in influencer marketing or managing social media accounts.
-Familiarity with user-generated content strategies.
-Basic knowledge of graphic design tools.

Benefits:
-Flexible working hours and remote work environment.
-Possibility to become the face of the brand.
-Potential for long-term collaboration.
-Opportunity to earn 30% commission on every TikTok and Instagram organic sale + a monthly retainer (after trial period)
-For UGC photos and videos a flat fee of $30 per photo and $50 per video

If you are passionate about fitness, bodybuilding and content creation and have a knack for storytelling, we would love to hear from you! Please submit your resume, a cover letter, and a portfolio or examples of your previous UGC cooperations. Be sure to include links to your TikTok and Instagram profiles.

Budget: $50
Posted On: June 15, 2024 18:20 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Community Management, UGC, Social Media Marketing, Instagram, Branding
Skills: Community Management, UGC, Social Media Marketing, Instagram, Branding
Country: Netherlands
click to apply

-Analyze content performance and provide insights for continuous improvement.

Requirements:
-Proven experience as a content creator, preferably in the fashion, fitness, or swimwear industries.
-Must be in very good physical shape (athletic, bodybuilding, lean etc.)
-Strong knowledge of TikTok and Instagram, including features, trends, and analytics.
-Excellent video editing skills and familiarity with editing tools/apps.
-Creative mindset with a keen eye for detail and aesthetics.
-Already a large fitness following on social media is a plus
-Passion for fitness, bodybuilding promoting a healthy lifestyle.
-Preferably living in a sunny location

Preferred Qualifications:
-Experience in influencer marketing or managing social media accounts.
-Familiarity with user-generated content strategies.
-Basic knowledge of graphic design tools.

Benefits:
-Flexible working hours and remote work environment.
-Possibility to become the face of the brand.
-Potential for long-term collaboration.
-Opportunity to earn 30% commission on every TikTok and Instagram organic sale + a monthly retainer (after trial period)
-For UGC photos and videos a flat fee of $30 per photo and $50 per video

If you are passionate about fitness, bodybuilding and content creation and have a knack for storytelling, we would love to hear from you! Please submit your resume, a cover letter, and a portfolio or examples of your previous UGC cooperations. Be sure to include links to your TikTok and Instagram profiles.

Budget: $50
Posted On: June 15, 2024 18:20 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Community Management, UGC, Social Media Marketing, Instagram, Branding
Skills: Community Management, UGC, Social Media Marketing, Instagram, Branding
Country: Netherlands
click to apply

item.title: Edit a 90 minute video interview & create transcript of the edited version. - Upwork
item.description:
We have a 90 minute zoom interview between 3 speakers. The main value of the interview is the speaker's experience as a manager and capturing the personality of the engineer/founder of a computer company. We need an experienced editor to do several things:
MILESTONE 1: CONTINUITY
1) cut out the coughs & dead end sentences and improve continuity. There are several places where the conversation wanders off topic, which can be eliminated.
2) improve sound quality as much as possible
submit for review
3) we would like you to suggest the most logical places to divide the video into several shorter

MILESTONE 2: TRANSCRIPT
3) once milestone 1 is approved, create a transcript of the video in a Microsoft Word doc.

MILESTONE 3: CLOSED CAPTIONING
4) cut the interview into several sections, add closed captions from the transcript, and add a intro and outro sequence (we will supply these)

Budget: $300
Posted On: June 15, 2024 18:17 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Audio Editing, Microsoft Word, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Audio Editing, Microsoft Word, Video Production
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: YouTube Video Editor using AI Tools - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented YouTube video editor with experience using AI tools. The ideal candidate will be responsible for editing podcasts and repurposing content into reels and shorts for TikTok and Instagram. Your primary focus will be to create engaging and visually appealing videos that align with our brand. As a YouTube video editor, you must have a strong understanding of current trends in video editing and social media platforms.

    Responsibilities:
    - Edit podcasts and repurpose content into reels and shorts for TikTok and Instagram
    - Use AI tools to enhance video quality and create captivating effects
    - Ensure videos are optimized for different social media platforms
    - Collaborate with the content team to develop creative concepts for videos

    Requirements:
    - Proven experience as a video editor, specifically for YouTube
    - Proficiency in using AI tools for video editing
    - Strong knowledge of current trends in video editing and social media platforms
    - Excellent communication and organizational skills

    If you are a creative and detail-oriented video editor with a passion for social media, we would love to hear from you. Please provide samples of your work or a portfolio showcasing your editing skills and expertise.

Hourly Range: $7.00-$20.00
Posted On: June 15, 2024 18:16 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Production
Skills: Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Production
Country: United States
click to apply
